special_text:
[+2]: Create a 1/1 green Slug creature token. Then you may sacrifice an artifact, if you do, create another token.
[0]: You may sacrifice a slug. If you do, return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, you gain 3 life.
[-9]: Put a permanent card with mana value 0 from your hand onto the battlefield. Then repeat this process for mana values 1 through 8.
[1]:
notes:

Until end of turn, Konzah becomes a X/5 Slug creature in addition to its other types. Where X is the number of creatures in your graveyard.

You may Sacrifice a non-token permanent. if you do, create two 1/1 Green slug creature tokens. otherwise, create a 1/1 Green slug creature token.
